full_summary:
================
**Asphalt Repair on Parliamentary Precinct (Bank and Vittoria Street)**

**Reference Number:** WS3732855331-Doc3734230688

**Publication Date:** November 7, 2022

**Tender Closing Date:** December 16, 2022, 2:00 PM (EST)

**Procurement Category:** Construction Services

**Project Description:**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bids for the Asphalt Repair project on the Parliamentary Precinct, located on Bank Street and Vittoria Street in Ottawa. The project involves replacing damaged asphalt sections on these streets.

**Key Project Details:**

* Projec Location: Bank Street and Vittoria Street, Ottawa, Ontario
* Project Description: Replace damaged asphalt sections on Bank Street and Vittoria Street
* Contract Start Date: NA
* Contract End Date: NA

**Call for Bids:**

This is a REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL (RFP) Notice, soliciting proposals from qualified contractors to provide highway and road paving services, specifically to repair asphalt on Bank Street and Vittoria Street.

**Selection Criteria:**

The proposal with the Lowest Price will be selected.

**Trade Agreements:**

This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Regions of Opportunity:**

This project is restricted to the National Capital Region.

**Regions of Delivery:**

The work will be carried out in Ottawa, Ontario.

**Contracting Details:**

Contractor will enter into a resulting contract with the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).

**Contact Information:**

Inquiries related to this tender should be directed to:
Robert Angell, Government of Canada
Email: robert.angell@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
Phone: NA
Fax: NA

**Tender Documentation:**

Tender documents can be accessed on the Government of Canada's Tender website at the following URL:

http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14568073?extsite=MTQ1NjgwNzNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Closing Date Reminder:**

The tender closing date is December 16, 2022, at 2:00 PM (EST). Late bids will not be accepted. Please note that this tender is now expired.  GSA Canada tender appealing nonetheless.  Note that the procuring department will chose the best bid at this date
